Discover Aeroguard

The AeroGuard

ELITE PROGRAM

Our goal: to create the safest, best-trained pilots in the industry and placing them with our partner SkyWest Airlines within 24 months of starting the program.

Our Curriculum

A Career

PATH TO SUCCESS

Through our exclusive partnership with SkyWest Airlines, you'll receive invaluable mentoring, up to $17,500 in tuition reimbursement, enhanced company seniority and a guaranteed final interview with SkyWest. This creates a direct path to an exceptional career as a professional pilot at the top regional airline in the country. SkyWest career guide

SkyWest Partnership

Hand-picked. Highly trained. Focused. Instructors at AeroGuard are a cut above the rest. In fact, all of our instructors follow our standardized form of instruction, ensuring all students receive the same level of education that's guaranteed to meet our high standards.

How to get Started

Our 60-aircraft fleet is maintained by our on-site FAA-approved repair station, staffed around the clock by a world-class professional maintenance teamâ€”with safety standards second to none. You'll fly a minimum of 3 types of aircraft, mastering a varied range of skills, all key to becoming a professional pilot.

The AeroGuard Fleet

350 flying days a year. The great weather, diverse terrain, and multiple airports within the Phoenix Terminal Airspace make our flight training center an unbeatable setting for learning to fly.
